_documentation.description: Template for creating a Data Pipeline in Microsoft Fabric using the REST API

_placeholders.{workspaceId}: Replace with your Fabric workspace ID (GUID)
_placeholders.<BASE64_ENCODED_PIPELINE_DEFINITION>: Replace with Base64-encoded pipeline definition from sample_fabric_pipeline.json
_placeholders.<FABRIC_BLOB_STORAGE_CONNECTION_ID>: Replace with your Fabric connection ID for Azure Blob Storage
_placeholders.<FABRIC_AZURE_SQL_CONNECTION_ID>: Replace with your Fabric connection ID for Azure SQL Database
